name: Perfectly Valid Excuse
description:
So uhh, yeah I uhhh, I need to be honest with you. We uh, we made a game where like uhhh, you have to like, bend the truth a bit? No worries, you totally went to work today right? Oh you didn't? Oh shit here comes the boss!

Inspired  by early 2000s Newgrounds Flash games where you have to negotiate your way out extremely important situations.

Made for Pig Squad's Summer Slow Jam, Remix Theme.

Art by: Infinitebrians

Music by: Hempuli

Everything Else by: BIGHONKINBURGER
